structured_document.title: League of Legends Esports Schedule
structured_document.summary: The document provides a schedule for League of Legends esports events, including regional splits, international tournaments, and leagues.

facts.statement: The esports season will run from January to October.
The MSI tournament will take place from June 27th to July 12th.
The LEC Madrid Experience will be held on September 9th.

key_insights: The document provides a comprehensive schedule for League of Legends esports events, including regional splits, international tournaments, and leagues.
The esports season will run from January to October, with key events like the MSI tournament and LEC Madrid Experience.
The document has high confidence in its entities, facts, and topics, indicating a reliable source.
recommendations: Verify the accuracy of the schedule by cross-checking with official League of Legends esports sources.
Consider using this document as a reference for planning and organizing esports events.
Monitor the esports season's progress and adjust strategies accordingly.
risk_factors: Inaccurate or outdated information in the document could lead to misplanning or misexecution of esports events.
Dependence on a single source for esports event schedules may not be sufficient, leading to potential gaps or inconsistencies.
opportunities: Utilizing this document as a resource to improve esports event planning and organization.
Leveraging the League of Legends esports schedule to enhance fan engagement and experience.
Exploring opportunities for collaboration with Riot Games or other esports organizations using this document as a starting point.
